message: Let's split 70/30.  It's a good deal for you in the first round, Bob!
Your offer was a bit greedy, Alice. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'll take a little less than my first offer, you get a little more than your offer. 65/35?
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need a larger share. Do you accept 55/45?
Bob, time is running out.  This is my final offer. 60/40, take it or leave it!
